attributes.title: e.l.f. Cosmetics
attributes.description: I worked with the founder and the e-commerce team to launch the first mobile site, relaunch to responsive onto a new platform, and invent new ways of integrating UGC, brand editorial, and traditional shopping. I also helped develop a monthly subscription program that enabled customers to try and share new looks.

pageProps.body:
I joined e.l.f. when it was a lean start-up, just before its growth surge. This is where I cut my teeth on all things digital, and really fell in love with product design. I was relied upon to create the most efficient digital footprintâ€”from the brand site, to email, and social. I art directed photo shoots, wireframed and launched site extensions, full site relaunches, and built a creative team. With a direct line to our founder and engineers, we worked fast and iterated often. This is an overview of the launch to responsive, with mobile as the main target.
